Title: Xhtml To Tiff
Description:
Convert XHTML input to XAML, XPS and TIFF output.

Developed in C# with a WPF user interface following the MVVM pattern.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Convert XHTML input to XAML, XPS and TIFF output.

Developed in C# with a WPF user interface following the MVVM pattern.

Sample UI and output: http://cricketsoft.com/SampleConversion.aspx

This project was created in response to a question on the StackOverflow site.
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/493164/what-page-image-generating-technology-should-i-use/558743#558743

Author: Tom Allen
